p.s: I have received your e-mail about your future school year at the School ASchool A and the label school without racism and school with courage and I am very pleased to hear that you are coming to visit us and that you read about the label.
I found an article about it and I have a lot to share.
First offof the label school without racism, school with courage is currently the biggest German school label with more than 3000 schools participating unit.
One participant commented on the label, his name is Karim Fereidooni.

He said that there cannot be a racism free school because of the big gathering of different people and ethnicities but there can be word done against racism so that schools get a sensibility when it comes to this particular topic.
The schools on the label are extremely aware of the racism occuring in different schools and they oriented themselves on a study made by the University of Mannheim.
The study is called Max versus Murat.
To clear things up, Max is a typical germanGerman name and Murat is a typical turkishTurkish name.
The study showed that even though both Max and Murat presented a work with the same amount of mistakes, the teacher graded Murat's work worse than Max's.
A major problem to racism is that it is not mentioned and it is ignored.
By not giving this topic the amount of attention that is needed, schools are going to continue behaving in a racist manner.
Many teachers are not even aware of their racist behaviour and are sometimes racist without realizing it.
The article also mentions that racism is taught in early ages through kids books or cartoons which influences kids of behaving that way.
I'm now at the School ASchool A for one and a hald years and I can assure you that racism is being handled very positively.
I have seen teachers talk about it and made sure that the students know the problem of racism.
Nevertheless, racism is still happening and we should continue to fight against it.
